entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
